column6: "ORIGINS AND ENDINGS" Part 4 (of 5)  The secret is out.  Wolverine remembers.  Everything.  The entire blood-stained tapestry of his long, tortured life.  And now that's it's been laid out before him in vivid detail, there's only one question: What's his first move?  Well, whatever it is, it's brought him to Russia for an encounter with the legendary warrior known as the Winter Soldier.  One thing's for sure -- they're headed for a major turf battle.  Question is, can they find common ground?
column8: | penciller (cover):Kaare Andrews | letterer:Randy Gentile | penciller:Javier Saltares | colorist:J. D. Smith | inker:Mark Texeira | writer:Daniel Way
